messages.subject: Re :Extreme
messages.msgSnippet: I know the 19yo in CA isn t having sex because of what he is doing out there. He is with another fellow 24/7 and they have a job to do and that s what they are
messages.messageBody:
I know the 19yo in CA isn't having sex because of what he is doing
out there. He is with another fellow 24/7 and they have a job to do
and that's what they are doing. If they don't follow the "rules" they
get sent home. They CHOOSE to do this with open eyes, so I'm not at
all worried that he is out there doing anything other than what he is
supposed to be. And I'm 100% sure sex isn't involved.
>>>>>>>

Sex can happen between two fellas too, ya know.... 24/7, thats a lot of time
together, that other fella might start looking good to him.. Unless you are
also with him 24/7, there is no way you can know "100%" what he is doing.
I'm not saying he IS having sex, but it is impossible for you to insist that you
know he is not.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
